name: **Tramore Bay**
description: Tramore Bay S583-012 Sheet 76 Tramore is a lovely tourist town and Tramore Bay is a “beach break” surfing paradise. Parking is at the beach. The beach surfs well in SWs, which makes it one of gthe more dependable locations in the country. The “trá mór” itself is the long beach E of the town under the high sandhills of the Burrow, beautiful to walk, and very popular. Reminiscent of a machaire system, which it isn’t, technically, Tramore inner bay has all the attractions of such inner bays everywhere, strictly for the purist. Parking for the inner bay is at S628-006 on its E side, many miles E by road from Tramore itself.
